REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f4148 reute r f BC-TRITON-GROUP-<TRRO.O> 06-18 0073

TEXT.TITLE: TRITON GROUP <TRRO.O> PRESIDENT RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Triton Group Ltd said John Stiska has resigned as its president. He will be replaced by Triton Chairman Charles Scott. Stiska will return to private law practice and will continue to serve as special counsel to Triton and to Intermark Inc <IMI>. Intermark, which owns 41 pct of Triton's common stock, took a controlling interest in the company in March, 1986. Reuter
